channel.title: Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus on Amazon EKS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus on Amazon EKS Workshop

item.title: Monitoring using Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus / Grafana
item.description: Introduction Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus (AMP) Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus is a monitoring service for metrics compatible with the open source Prometheus project, making it easier for you to securely monitor container environments. AMP is a solution for monitoring containers based on the popular Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) Prometheus project. AMP is powered by Cortex, an open source CNCF project that adds horizontal scalability to ingest, store, query, and alert on Prometheus metrics.
